snippet.title: In Plain Sight - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Add to Steam Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1290190/In_Plain_Sight/
Find out more about In Plain Sight here: www.fireyside.com

“In Plain Sight” is an emotional and impactful story that takes place in modern America among residents of a trailer park that struggle not only with their economic situation but also with a net of mysteries and secrets. The game follows 17-year-old Mackenzie Carter, who desperately needs to find out what happened to her mother. During this journey, Mackenzie also gets in touch with her dear but estranged friend April as they both try to uncover even the darkest truth.

“In Plain Sight” is a choice based narrative-adventure in third person perspective and will debut on Steam in the Summer of 2020.

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fireyside/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/FYside
